definition: plaited matting (of rushes, bamboo etc)/silkworm basket/metal foil/foil paper

sentences.english: This product has a tamper-evident foil pouch.
sentences.chinese: 此產品具有防揭鋁箔袋。

sentences.english: Lay a sheet of aluminium foil over the pan.
sentences.chinese: 在盤子上蓋一層鋁箔紙。

sentences.english: The good conductivity makes aluminum foil food containers within the food can be quickly heated.
sentences.chinese: 而鋁良好的傳導性使得鋁箔餐盒內的食物能很快加熱。

sentences.english: Learn how to measure aluminum foil to wrap presents in this free gift wrapping video.
sentences.chinese: 學習如何測量鋁箔包裝在此免費贈包裝視頻。

sentences.english: Top edge of plate using anti-seepage dustproof aluminum foil seal.
sentences.chinese: 板頂邊運用防滲防塵鋁箔帶密封。

sentences.english: Good ductility of aluminum foil, can do a variety of styles of lunch boxes, beautiful and clear Cool.
sentences.chinese: 鋁箔延展性好，能做各種樣式的餐盒，美觀清爽。

sentences.english: Dedicated to after the aluminum foil sealing, to tight the loosen lid again.
sentences.chinese: 專用於鋁箔封口後，再次給鬆動的蓋子旋緊。

sentences.english: Wrap the turkey up in aluminum foil.
sentences.chinese: 用鋁箔把火雞纏繞起來。

sentences.english: This article introduces causes of aluminium foil surface oil stain and sticking.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了鋁箔表面產生油斑和油粘的原因。

sentences.english: The aluminum foil is adhered with paper and the advertisement information is printed on the hard paper disk and the paper.
sentences.chinese: 在鋁箔上粘了紙，在硬紙片及紙上印有廣告信息。

sentences.english: Prick potatoes all over with fork, wrap each in aluminum foil, and place on rimmed baking sheet.
sentences.chinese: 用叉子在甘薯上刺洞，用鋁箔包裹，放置在烤單邊緣。

sentences.english: The existence of pinholes is a general phenomenon on thin gauge aluminium foils.
sentences.chinese: 針孔是厚度較小的鋁箔中普遍存在的現象。

sentences.english: The transducer was consisted of four pieces of tin-foil which were stuck on the surface of the bubble level.
sentences.chinese: 其傳感器是由粘於水準管玻璃表面上的四塊鋁箔組成。

sentences.english: Embossing with foil instead of ink can assist to eliminate cracking on coated stocks.
sentences.chinese: 壓花鋁箔帶代替油墨，可以協助消除在塗層股票開裂。

sentences.english: The ingots can be seen rolled into foil in some plants.
sentences.chinese: 在某些工廠，可以看到這些鋁錠被軋製成鋁箔。

sentences.english: Tour says the signals can be blocked by wrapping groceries in aluminum foil.
sentences.chinese: 圖爾說，用鋁箔包裝商品便可屏蔽這種信號。
